Body: Possible Duplicate:  New phone: How to transfer game progress?  I just rooted my HTC Legend and succesfuly obtained the files for a few apps from the /data/data directory. I am now unsure on how I should go about getting that data onto my Samsung Galaxy S3 without rooting it. Can I use adb to do this or does adb use system images or something like that in order to restore backups.Thanks.
Title: How to get app backups to Samsung Galaxy S3

history.Text: I just rooted my HTC Legend and succesfuly obtained the files for a few apps from the /data/data directory. I am now unsure on how I should go about getting that data onto my Samsung Galaxy S3 without rooting it. Can I use adb to do this or does adb use system images or something like that in order to restore backups.Thanks.
